commit message: Changed default text size to match appearanceLarge
Starting fixing preference margin issue on tablets. Also fixes #42 . Forgot to set action listener and it is a bad idea to name action provider the same as menu option
Starting fixing preference margin issue on tablets. Also fixes #42 . Forgot to set action listener and it is a bad idea to name action provider the same as menu option
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:spacecowboy/NotePad
Correct preference padding on 7inch now. Looking at 10in next
Using formula margin + side_padding + inner_padding. hoping it is correct for 1280x800 res
Removed comment
Added Gmail like selectors for light themes. Also changed default theme to light.
Changed list background and portrait selector to gmail clones. Also changed default theme to light.
New icon!
Actionbar was null in a crash report. Dont understand how, but encase in if anyway.

Dark theme selectors work again. Title and Date implemented inthe UI. All gtasks fields added to database.
Added feature graphics!
Editor portrait layout. Needs some tweaking with padding and margins but it works.
Added padding to layout
Fixed date format for calendar case
Fixed default title showing in editor
No longer puts cursor in beginning on open
Changed back to dark default for activity. Black flash is less intrusive than white flash
Now doesnt save note even though duedate did not change
Now displays correct date on new notes set date
Sharing and copying works with new fields now
Revert option works properly now
Fixed crash risk
Removed state from sharedprefs and use instancebundle instead. it works fine this way and is easier to maintain.
Reselection after modal mode ended now fixed (for all). fixes #43

Fixed bottom padding obscuring the text when writing a new line and textview filled teh screen
